title: Designing Customized Mathematics Pedagogy Based on Learning Styles

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Focuses on helping preservice and in-service teachers understand and apply interactions between learning styles and teaching methods in mathematics education

learning_goals: Learners can classify learning styles with over 80% accuracy using a learning style diagnostic tool.
Learners can design and apply at least three mathematics teaching methods tailored to learning styles.
Learners can enhance learning effectiveness by over 20% using formative assessment tools in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
